document.title: e-Lex
document.intro: e-Lex is a lexical database of Dutch consisting of a one-word lexicon and a multi-word lexicon. The one-word lexicon contains ca. 220,000 entries and more than 600,000 word forms. The entries of the lexicon are annotated with morphological, syntactical and phonological information. A pa...

access.title: available for non-commercial and commercial organisations; user licence required
